snippet.title: THEIR LAND: Gameplay Trailer | English
snippet.description:
Add Their Land to your wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2430990/Their_Land/

Join the Discord Server right here! https://discord.gg/ZuJaUum2Dn

The South Atlantic holds a secret that few have dared to uncover – a mysterious, unexplored island shrouded in mystery and mystique. It beckons to a group of intrepid adventurers, seasoned in the art of danger and the thrill of exploration.

Their mission: to uncover untold riches of raw materials to fuel a burgeoning mining industry, and to scout potential sites for the construction of entire towns and cities on this untouched terrain. But what lies beneath the surface of this island and why has it never been entered?

... or left?

You are Jeremy, an inexperienced 19-year-old who finds himself thrust into the heart of this enigma. The island’s secrets call to you, drawing you ever deeper into a world of danger. Will you uncover the hidden treasures of this fabled land, or will you fall victim to its many perils?

You can’t save everyone. But you can try…
